laboratory_examinations.findings: Liver echotexture and echogenicity normal. Portal vein patent with normal hepatopetal flow. Common bile duct measures 6 mm. Gallbladder slightly distended with mild-to-moderate wall thickening and multiple small stones. Kidneys normal in size (Right: 9.7 cm, Left: 10.6 cm), spleen normal (10.1 cm). No evidence of ascites.
